Name: Germans
History: The Germans were the Germanic tribes of continental Europe. With heavy infantry and cavalry, German warriors valiantly resisted Roman campaigns of conquest.

Technologies.Name: Schlacht im Teutoburger Wald
Technologies.Description: A set amount of metal from every unit destroyed.

CivBonuses.Name: Ardiosmanae
CivBonuses.Description: Enhanced food gained from ranching and farming.

CivBonuses.Name: Deas Celtica
CivBonuses.History: Celtic religion and druidry inspired their warlike mindset.
CivBonuses.Description: Druids increase attack rates of soldiers near them slightly.

TeamBonuses.Name: Druidic Wisdom
TeamBonuses.History: The Druids maintained an organized religion that advanced the technology of their people even during wartime.
